name: pm-react-components
author: Oracly Team
description: oraclyv1 dapp's common react components such as van bar and connect bar

scripts.start: rm -rf app && NODE_ENV=production babel --watch src --out-dir app --copy-files
scripts.build: rm -rf app && NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir app --copy-files
scripts.autolink:pm: npm link && cd ../pm-webtrader && npm link pm-global-header
scripts.autolink:st: npm link && cd ../pm-webstaking && npm link pm-global-header
scripts.autolink:mt: npm link && cd ../pm-webmentoring && npm link pm-global-header
scripts.autolink:all: npm link && cd ../pm-webtrader && npm link pm-global-header && cd ../pm-webstaking && npm link pm-global-header && cd ../pm-webmentoring && npm link pm-global-header
